patthana16.93:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ niyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.93:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
